main_definition: The Hilton is a well-known hotel chain that operates hotels worldwide, or the famous hotel owned by Conrad Hilton in Las Vegas.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A member of the wealthy Hilton family
meanings_and_examples.example: Conrad Hilton was a prominent businessman and philanthropist, making him one of the notable members of the Hilton family.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An affluent hotel chain established by Conrad Hilton
meanings_and_examples.example: I stayed at the Hilton Hotel during my vacation in New York City.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A nickname for the famous Las Vegas Hilton casino resort
meanings_and_examples.example: The Hilton is a popular tourist destination, known for its luxurious hotel and iconic sign on the Strip.
